com.hazelcast.client.impl.clientside

Class ClientICacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.client.impl.clientside.ClientICacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICacheManager

    public class ClientICacheManager
extends Object
implements ICacheManager
    Hazelcast instance cache manager provides a means to obtain JCache caches via HazelcastInstance API. Note that this is not a JCache CacheManager.
    See Also:
    ICacheManager

    • Method Detail

      • getCache

        public <K,V> ICache<K,V> getCache(String name)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheManager

        Returns the cache instance with the specified prefixed cache name.

        Prefixed cache name is the name with URI and classloader prefixes if available. There is no Hazelcast prefix (/hz/). For example, myURI/foo. 

         
     <prefixed_cache_name> = [<uri_prefix>/] + [<cl_prefix>/] + <pure_cache_name>
        where <pure_cache_name> is the cache name without any prefix. For example foo. As seen from the definition, URI and classloader prefixes are optional. URI prefix is generated as content of this URI as a US-ASCII string. (uri.toASCIIString()) Classloader prefix is generated as string representation of the specified classloader. (cl.toString())
        Specified by:
        getCache in interface ICacheManager
        Parameters:
        name - the prefixed name of the cache
        Returns:
        the cache instance with the specified prefixed name
        See Also:

      • getCacheByFullName

        public <K,V> ICache<K,V> getCacheByFullName(String fullName)
